docs.abstract: Troy Young was elevated to lead the magazine division in 2018 as the face of digital transformation despite complaints of bullying and harassing behavior.
docs.snippet: Troy Young was elevated to lead the magazine division in 2018 as the face of digital transformation despite complaints of bullying and harassing behavior.
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of Hearst’s magazine division resigned Thursday, one day after The New York Times reported on his history of lewd, sexist remarks in the workplace.

headline.main: Hearst Magazines President Resigns After Report About Workplace Behavior

docs.abstract: President Donald Trump recruited Baseball Hall of Famer Mariano Rivera to help mark baseball's Opening Day with a group of Little League players at the White House on Thursday.
docs.snippet: President Donald Trump recruited Baseball Hall of Famer Mariano Rivera to help mark baseball's Opening Day with a group of Little League players at the White House on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump recruited Baseball Hall of Famer Mariano Rivera to help mark baseball's Opening Day with a group of Little League players at the White House on Thursday.

headline.main: Trump, Mariano Rivera Mark Opening Day at White House
headline.print_headline: Trump, Mariano Rivera Mark Opening Day at White House

docs.abstract: Mexico’s anti-monopoly commission said Thursday it looking into possible price-fixing or monopolistic practices in the market for medical oxygen, after pharmacies reported a spike in prices and difficulties in getting tanks and refills.
docs.snippet: Mexico’s anti-monopoly commission said Thursday it looking into possible price-fixing or monopolistic practices in the market for medical oxygen, after pharmacies reported a spike in prices and difficulties in getting tanks and refills.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY — Mexico’s anti-monopoly commission said Thursday it looking into possible price-fixing or monopolistic practices in the market for medical oxygen, after pharmacies reported a spike in prices and difficulties in getting tanks and refills.

headline.main: Mexico Opens Anti-Monopoly Probe Amid Oxygen Price Rise
headline.print_headline: Mexico Opens Anti-Monopoly Probe Amid Oxygen Price Rise

docs.abstract: More than a thousand Twitter employees and contractors as of earlier this year had access to internal tools that could change user account settings and hand control to others, two former employees said, making it hard to defend against the hacking that occurred last week.
docs.snippet: More than a thousand Twitter employees and contractors as of earlier this year had access to internal tools that could change user account settings and hand control to others, two former employees said, making it hard to defend against the hacking...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — More than a thousand Twitter employees and contractors as of earlier this year had access to internal tools that could change user account settings and hand control to others, two former employees said, making it hard to defend against the hacking that occurred last week.

headline.main: Exclusive: More Than 1,000 People at Twitter Had Ability to Aid Hack of Accounts-Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: More Than 1,000 People at Twitter Had Ability to Aid Hack of Accounts-Sources

docs.abstract: College football leaders are in the process of piecing together plans for a regular season during the COVID-19 pandemic.
docs.snippet: College football leaders are in the process of piecing together plans for a regular season during the COVID-19 pandemic.
docs.lead_paragraph: College football leaders are in the process of piecing together plans for a regular season during the COVID-19 pandemic.

headline.main: If College Football Is Played, Will Bowls Be Salvaged, Too?
headline.print_headline: If College Football Is Played, Will Bowls Be Salvaged, Too?

docs.abstract: A California panel on Thursday recommended that Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten be paroled after serving nearly five decades in prison.
docs.snippet: A California panel on Thursday recommended that Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten be paroled after serving nearly five decades in prison.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — A California panel on Thursday recommended that Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten be paroled after serving nearly five decades in prison.

headline.main: Parole Recommended for Manson Follower Leslie Van Houten
headline.print_headline: Parole Recommended for Manson Follower Leslie Van Houten

docs.abstract: Sudan has found a mass grave that most likely contains remains of 28 army officers executed in 1990 for plotting an attempted coup against the former President Omar al-Bashir, the public prosecutor office said late on Thursday.
docs.snippet: Sudan has found a mass grave that most likely contains remains of 28 army officers executed in 1990 for plotting an attempted coup against the former President Omar al-Bashir, the public prosecutor office said late on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: KHARTOUM — Sudan has found a mass grave that most likely contains remains of 28 army officers executed in 1990 for plotting an attempted coup against the former President Omar al-Bashir, the public prosecutor office said late on Thursday.

headline.main: Sudan Finds Mass Grave Believed to Have Bodies of Officers Executed by Bashir
headline.print_headline: Sudan Finds Mass Grave Believed to Have Bodies of Officers Executed by Bashir

docs.abstract: An eastern Missouri man was sentenced to time served and probation after pleading guilty Thursday to sending several death threats to U.S. Sen. Josh Hawley of Missouri last year.
docs.snippet: An eastern Missouri man was sentenced to time served and probation after pleading guilty Thursday to sending several death threats to U.S. Sen. Josh Hawley of Missouri last year.
docs.lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, Mo. — An eastern Missouri man was sentenced to time served and probation after pleading guilty Thursday to sending several death threats to U.S. Sen. Josh Hawley of Missouri last year.

headline.main: Man Sentenced to Time Served for Threatening Kansas Senator
headline.print_headline: Man Sentenced to Time Served for Threatening Kansas Senator

docs.abstract: Virginia's largest school system is removing the name of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee from one of its high schools in favor of the late U.S. Rep. John Lewis.
docs.snippet: Virginia's largest school system is removing the name of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee from one of its high schools in favor of the late U.S. Rep. John Lewis.
docs.lead_paragraph: SPRINGFIELD, Va. — Virginia's largest school system is removing the name of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee from one of its high schools in favor of the late U.S. Rep. John Lewis.

headline.main: Board Changes School's Name From Robert E. Lee to John Lewis
headline.print_headline: Board Changes School's Name From Robert E. Lee to John Lewis

docs.abstract: A strong majority of Americans from across the political spectrum back more federal government relief to businesses and households hurt by the coronavirus pandemic, according to a Reuters/IPSOS poll.
docs.snippet: A strong majority of Americans from across the political spectrum back more federal government relief to businesses and households hurt by the coronavirus pandemic, according to a Reuters/IPSOS poll.
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK — A strong majority of Americans from across the political spectrum back more federal government relief to businesses and households hurt by the coronavirus pandemic, according to a Reuters/IPSOS poll.

headline.main: Americans Broadly Back More Federal Coronavirus Relief: Reuters/IPSOS Poll
headline.print_headline: Americans Broadly Back More Federal Coronavirus Relief: Reuters/IPSOS Poll
